author: killari.
content: I guess EIP editing and submiting is somewhat similar problem that scientific journals are solving in scientific writing. There's split "this is written in correct format" and "this thing makes sense technically"  people. The journal tries to find people who knows about the topic to review it before its published. I think in EIP's we would still need third set of people who would then decide if its implemented (depending on what kind of proposal it is)

author: killari.
content: I guess this is bit unrelated discussion for <#804019759934078987>
